## osp task list

List tasks

### Synopsis

List all tasks for a repository.

```
osp task list [owner/repo] [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --category string   Task category filter
      --format string     Output format (text, json) (default "text")
  -h, --help              help for list
      --status string     Task status filter
```
